content.p: Welcome information Are you ready to join us on campus? Here's everything you need to know to plan your travel and arrival. When to arrive | Accommodation | How to get to our campuses Make sure you arrive in Nottingham before your course start date to ensure you can move in and get settled. Take a look at our accommodation pages for information on what to do before you move in, an arrival guide, and more. Accommodation Get detailed maps and directions for each of our UK campuses. There are plenty of ways to arrive by public transport, find out which one is best for you. If you're joining us from overseas, take a look at our international travel advice.
